8ccae12a-9f04-4d27-8940-374446050530.name: k8s_node_name
8ccae12a-9f04-4d27-8940-374446050530.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'k8s_node_name') AS k8s_node_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'k8s_node_cpu_time' AND JSONExtractString(labels, 'k8s_cluster_name') = {{.k8s_cluster_name}}
GROUP BY k8s_node_name

e4232384-ad99-4479-8cec-e027a18921c4.name: k8s_cluster_name
e4232384-ad99-4479-8cec-e027a18921c4.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'k8s_cluster_name') AS k8s_cluster_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'k8s_node_cpu_time'
GROUP BY k8s_cluster_name
